name: Memento Mori LOADED charm bracelet HUMAN TOOTH skulls macabre gothic victorian
description:
A little Grisly & macabre but even more sparkley and stunning :)

Memento mori has a variety of definitions one of which is"remember you must die"..I would also like to think of this as being designed to remind the wearer of their mortality and of the brevity and fragility of human life. Live for today be happy and enjoy each one :)

This is soo very full and chunky!!!a real statement piece!certainly a talking point!!..not one i'd reccomend for everyday wear (i wouldn't wear it for doing the washing up in ;)

The chain is an extra chunky curb in silver tone metal ..Fastens with a stunning  trigger clasp and  ring fastener ..

This Bracelet is super loaded with TOP QUALITY charms and beads.

Large ornate black wood and silver metal crucifix with corpus, dip dye ombre skeletal lady of the dead cameo in ornate setting with cross dangle,Real victorian human tooth , set in ornate setting with sparkley beads,pewter hearse with bead,sugar skull with glass bead, ouija boardraven,rose,skeletal hand, rip tombstone winged skull angel,skeletal senorita,key,crucifix,skull etc.....carved howlite skull bead,czech glass carved skull bead ,carved yak bone skull bead and a black lucite rose cabochon, and two funerial black trumpet lillies with glass pearly bead centres,then a mix of stunning top quality czech glass beads  ..

Every single link on this bracelet is filled All beads are individually hand wrapped for security ,not just rosary looped on,my jump rings are uk made proffesional quality hardwearing not at all flimsy. 

MEASURES APPROX " 7.11

name: CONJOINED SIAMESE TWINS SKELETON SKULLS LARGE ornate Cameo NECKLACE GOTH HORROR
description:
Gorgeous  large antique ivory on black conjoined skeletal twins cameo with 

semper et ubique "always true /always loyal" in latin

Large weighty ornate setting in antique silver tone ,it's a really nice big size not at all small and flimsy!.Setting is approx 6cm long.

Look's really striking and unusual on a real statement piece.

On a nice weight tonal chain approx "18 with lobster clasp.
